post:
Hey, everybody! Happy holidays from Zetta Hosting Solutions! It's that time of year again and you know what that means! Discounts!
From today 14.12.2012 until 21.12.2012 all of our Shared/Semi-Dedicated/VPS plans are 50% OFF, because Santa came to town and got us in the Christmas spirit a little early.
